channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #ja @ 1524933180792643584

item.description: Jeeee! #avoindata - ja henk koht lämmittää tietty, että erityisesti #ilmakuvat mainittu erikseen! 🥳 https://t.co/ZePwe9YdKn

item.title: #fi @ 1524843550285910027
item.description: Hienoa @Maanmittaus'laitos ja onnea! ...Maanmittauslaitos on avannut esimerkillisesti paikkatietoja koskevaa dataansa. #paikkatiedot #avoindata #jääraappa https://t.co/1a5zt3uOtp

item.title: #en @ 1524814094657720321
item.description:
Two years ago, @Microsoft set out to close the data divide by launching the Open Data Campaign. Today, we further that commitment through our launch of “Data for Society” – a new centralized resource for datasets that Microsoft has made open.
Read more: https://t.co/CBJ1vmgrIF

item.title: #pt @ 1524813700754022402
item.description:
Dados abertos permitem q pessoas e organizações mto bacanas verifiquem se as empresas de ônibus estão entregando aquilo q são pagas pra fazer (lembram do papo de ontem sb GPS?).
E o q elas são pagas pra fazer?
🚍 ÔNIBUS NA PARADA. 🕓 PONTUAL. 🫶 CONFIÁVEL. 🥵 SEM SUPERLOTAÇÃO.

item.title: #es @ 1524801592519708672
item.description:
📌Los invitamos a participar en la Semana de Gobierno Abierto, donde se realizará la instalación de la Red Estatal de Datos Abiertos #REDA de #Chihuahua en el marco del #RetodeApertura2022 de #InfraestructuraAbierta🏗️
Conoce los detalles aquí ⬇️ https://t.co/6tA71oOd8i

item.title: #en @ 1524801557031575568
item.description: BREAKING: Microsoft Launches Open Data Resource, "Data for Society" -- https://t.co/bINoBcldmw #DataScience @Microsoft

item.title: #en @ 1524801327594881026
item.description:
.@Microsoft is working to make data that is relevant to important social problems as open as possible, including by contributing open data ourselves.
Introducing “Data for Society”: https://t.co/sSE5Z0PG5K https://t.co/ZgboRGENBI

item.title: #pt @ 1524800967807574017
item.description:
Vocês aguentam mais um (mini) 🧶 sobre ônibus?
Quem aí já teve curiosidade de saber que informações do sistema de ônibus estão disponíveis no portal Dados Abertos DF?
Alguém chuta quantos conjuntos de dados há lá sobre o tema? 🚍

item.title: #de @ 1524792238651363331
item.description:
Das Problem ist aber: Wir haben seit 15 Jahren dieselbe Vision, bei der alles ab Schritt 4 in weiter Ferne erscheint. Und gerade in Deutschland kam nie irgendwas über 3⋆ hinaus.
Deshalb schlage ich heute eine neue Version von 5⋆ #OpenData vor.
5⋆ #OpenData 2022. https://t.co/XwPSOktWvo

item.title: #de @ 1524792234029199361
item.description:
Kennt ihr diese Unternehmensstrategien, die nach den ersten konkreten Schritten nach hinten raus einfach total unrealistisch werden?
Ich glaube das ist auch das Problem bei 5⋆ #OpenData. Leute glauben, das es OK ist nach Schritt 3 aufzuhören. Weil 3 von 5 ist ja auch schon gut. https://t.co/iAFGLS9q9K

item.title: #en @ 1524780577492066306
item.description:
#OpenData can help us solve society’s biggest challenges.💡
Our new Data for Society resource center provides access to our open datasets, resources, and tools to make data sharing, research, and collaboration easier. Take a look: 👀

item.title: #en @ 1524775369890570241
item.description:
Happy first Anniversary, @EU4Space❗️
We look forward to many more years of successful market development cooperation to further extend the use and benefits of our #OpenData and information products
⬇️Your beautiful Prague home as seen by #Copernicus #Sentinel2 🛰️🇪🇺 on 8 May https://t.co/YPQCwju1or

item.title: #en @ 1524769312837357568
item.description: "I have also seen a global network of cassava enthusiasts emerge, interacting through an open data platform called CassavaBase." said NextGen Project Lead @cegesi @BTIscience https://t.co/2xcqPWT538

item.title: #en @ 1524756959374815233
item.description:
We've release V2 of our API!
Check out the new, fully discoverable data tree; more facet, filter, and sort controls; enhanced security; and additional data collections. #OpenData #EnergyTwitter
https://t.co/PNdFuL2MFH https://t.co/jST53BOyoB

item.title: #en @ 1524756054231375879
item.description:
Just did my first contribution to OpenStreetMap!! 🥳
A super nice coffee & bookshop in Charleroi - recommended by a Welcome To My Garden host nearby. Can't wait to see it coming up in my next query when we create secret slow travel trips 😍
#opendata
https://t.co/kKHtyjKXM3 https://t.co/2Fwke9eWjl

item.title: #en @ 1524755323474620423
item.description: Great presentation from @prats_clara in #Andorra . Highlighting the importance of #OpenData and the transversality of disciplines involved in health data analysis. Definitely an awesome lesson from the #COVID19 pandemia.Thanks @JordiSwiss for the amazing #PlanetaryHEALTH talks https://t.co/qTjS4d0USy

item.title: #en @ 1524748871032655873
item.description: Hey fellow comp soc scientists, aware of crypto events yes? Systemic crisis, possible tipping points (if tether..), massive collective actions, panic spreading, heated debate across social media, influencers flipping their reputation, etc. All with OPEN DATA. Just saying :)

item.title: #de @ 1524743305891696641
item.description: Spannende Tage in #Berlin. Morgen Meetup @jugendhackt Lab, heute mit @tursics den #oddmo22 planen. Wir machen was mit (Schul-) #OpenData. @derarndt, leg‘ ein gutes Wort im Fachbereich ein. 😉 @CodeForNRN @SmartCountryDE @mariosorg @lambdadigamma https://t.co/QiNOJd2dfO

item.title: #en @ 1524737122242117632
item.description:
In 2017, we launched @oceanprotocol, for an open data economy.
In 2018, markets hit harsh storms. We kept building. An amazing community emerged.
It's 2022. There are new storms. We're in a position to keep building, with our community. Let's do this🏗️🦈 https://t.co/lltcIHrg1W

item.title: #en @ 1524718217347977216
item.description: @emblebi @CambridgeIndy @wellcomegenome @HinxtonHall @embl I am incredibly humbled to receive this award. It reflects the hard work from so many of my team - especially @alexmsalmeida @saraskashaf, key collaborators @JulieSegre @LawleyLab @kyrpides @nsegata, and all the scientists who have contributed public open data.

item.title: #en @ 1524705756007776256
item.description:
"Researchers across fields often assume that their colleagues understand details without specifying them, and are therefore remiss when documenting units." 😣
You wouldn't believe how often this happens! So basic, yet so crucial #researcdata #opendata
https://t.co/nkGKGm7yLO

item.title: #en @ 1524695352716238848
item.description:
.@Tinkerershatom is a #Copernicus 🇪🇺🛰️ Accelerator alumni #startup that eases the use of our #OpenData
It makes the interpretation of EO data easier thanks to a deep-tech 3D interactive #geospatialdata visualisation platform🖥️
Discover their solutions👉 https://t.co/iROxLdwEwO https://t.co/3wtWzYb4aH

item.title: #de @ 1524677017911939072
item.description:
🌍 Das @EuroGeographics-Produkt EuroDEM ist ein europaweites digitales #OpenData-#Höhenmodell mit vert. 8-10m Genauigkeit, geeignet für Anwendungen im Maßstab 1:100.000. Es kann im #OpenMapsForEurope-Portal visualisiert und für Analysen genutzt werden.
➡️ https://t.co/ge0MZAxOk1 https://t.co/pUyVwKmRue

item.title: #de @ 1524674238657052673
item.description: Was geht ab an der @TH_Wildau – in Bauworkshops werden @OpenBikeSensor Bausätze zusammengebaut und als #CitizenScience Projekt auf die Straße geschickt, um #OpenData zum Radverkehr zu smammeln Codewort: #zuNah? Zu cool, der tolle Makerspace dazu😍 https://t.co/jnhp2hmqXc

item.title: #nl @ 1524672004846145538
item.description: 📊CBS update: Ruim 40 duizend (40679) mensen overleden aan COVID-19 van maart 2020 t/m januari 2022. In 2020 waren het 20173 (12% van alle sterfgevallen); in 2021 ging het om 19540 (11%). In januari 2022 waren het 966 overledenen. Tabel met #opendata: https://t.co/a8HI6LZayN https://t.co/U9809CdyoS

item.title: #en @ 1524601219704135685
item.description: @KyivIndependent I am not particularly happy about the amount of secrecy that surrounds almost every aspect of how one of the main platforms the people of this planet use to access news operates. Couldn’t we get some open data legislation finally?

item.title: #th @ 1524593073241849857
item.description:
Open Data คือ แนวทางของพรรคกล้า ในการทำ #GovTech มาสู้กับปัญหาคอร์รัปชั่นครับ ในบทบาทของ ส.ก. การเริ่มต้นที่สำนักงานเขตที่สะดวก โปร่งใส เป็นประโยชน์ต่อประชาชนอย่างมาก!
เขต #คลองสามวา เลือก ส.ก. 'มนูญ อินช่วย' #พรรคกล้า เบอร์5 ครับ
อ่านเพิ่มเติม: https://t.co/oXoIAKq8hD https://t.co/e281a8Ys1A

item.title: #fr @ 1524475603054907393
item.description: Quand on compare l’OpenData DMR de fév 21/janv 22 avec l’année 2021 on a déjà une augmentation de 2% des signalements. Pire les #TerrassesEstivales signalées enregistrent une croissance de 4% avec ce décalage d’un mois sur l’année. D’ici peu il y en aura plus que de #DMR voirie. https://t.co/eRUADjzgyv

item.description:

item.description: I'm really excited to be speaking at https://t.co/30YYhm66Qm on Friday, talking about "Unlocking Open Data using an Open Source Database". I'm also excited to announce there's a new logo on my slides: I'm now a Senior Solutions Architect at #crunchydata

Por ejemplo, Estonia tiene un score de 67‼️https://t.co/aQum4U6HkQ https://t.co/MOSTNkiLac https://t.co/rnfiZ1UMhp

item.title: #en @ 1524402564766351363
item.description: Ukraine is among the world's top 20 countries in terms of open data development. Actually we've reached 55 points, the same as Australia and Finland. Ukraine is brave, open and promising one. Source: international study Global Data Barometer. https://t.co/N0AKhpQQV2

item.title: #en @ 1524402083721527298
item.description: Kudos to @databarometer team, @SilvanavF has just launched and presented the results of the Global Data Barometer - first edition! Visit the website and see the results, the thematic modules and download the report at https://t.co/aSzOzHL6H3 #OpenData #datagovernance #datasharing https://t.co/jCgdbur2ub

item.title: #en @ 1524400188282052609
item.description: As I never seem to tire of the tail/dog metaphor, in this system a DEX is the tail & data sovereignty is the dog. A DEX is a key element for systemic self-reliance, to allow an open data economy to persist on its own. It's a rather needful gear for any ongoing L1 data ecosystem.

item.title: #en @ 1524399736681377792
item.description:
Out of the 109 countries surveyed by the @databarometer, over 70 countries have some kind of #opendata policy.
Is yours among them?🧐
Find out in the latest Global #DataBarometer Report!
Learn more👉: https://t.co/rtVSh2aLeY
#TheGDB https://t.co/C14cvXe1GO

item.description: Im #IT #Ausschuss #Muenchen haben wir heute die Stärkung von #OpenData beschlossen, mit einem umfangreichen Änderungsantrag von #gruenrotmuc: Maschinenlesbare Formate, periodische Abfrage, Anschluss an das govdata.portal etc.. @GrueneRathaus_M @RathausSPD https://t.co/zd8vQKylvI
